info.title: Catalogue
info.description: The Catalogue API provides a set of endpoints for accessing the TIDAL metadata catalogue: albums, artists, tracks, and videos

get.description: Retrieve a list of video details by TIDAL video ids.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of TIDAL video ids

400.description: Bad request on client party. Ensure the proper HTTP request is sent (query parameters, request body, etc.).

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: Number of tokens currently remaining. Refer to X-RateLimit-Replenish-Rate header for replenishment information.

X-RateLimit-Burst-Capacity.description: Initial number of tokens, and max number of tokens that can be replenished.

X-RateLimit-Replenish-Rate.description: Number of tokens replenished per second.

404.description: Resource not found. The requested resource is not found.

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: Number of tokens currently remaining. Refer to X-RateLimit-Replenish-Rate header for replenishment information.

X-RateLimit-Burst-Capacity.description: Initial number of tokens, and max number of tokens that can be replenished.

X-RateLimit-Replenish-Rate.description: Number of tokens replenished per second.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Something went wrong on the server party.

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: Number of tokens currently remaining. Refer to X-RateLimit-Replenish-Rate header for replenishment information.

X-RateLimit-Burst-Capacity.description: Initial number of tokens, and max number of tokens that can be replenished.

X-RateLimit-Replenish-Rate.description: Number of tokens replenished per second.

415.description: Unsupported Media Type. The API is using content negotiation. Ensure the proper media type is set into Content-Type header.

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: Number of tokens currently remaining. Refer to X-RateLimit-Replenish-Rate header for replenishment information.

X-RateLimit-Burst-Capacity.description: Initial number of tokens, and max number of tokens that can be replenished.

X-RateLimit-Replenish-Rate.description: Number of tokens replenished per second.

get.description: Retrieve a list of album items - tracks & videos - by TIDAL album id. This endpoint require additional pagination-related properties: 'offset' and 'limit'. Video Properties.description: Map of video-related properties. All properties are distributed across namespaces that acts as a map keys. Each namespace consists of list of related properties. The fact of the presence of a particular property effectively means that an item has this characteristic.

Track Properties.description: Map of track-related properties. All properties are distributed across namespaces that acts as a map keys. Each namespace consists of list of related properties. The fact of the presence of a particular property effectively means that an item has this characteristic.

Album Properties.description: Map of album-related properties. All properties are distributed across namespaces that acts as a map keys. Each namespace consists of list of related properties. The fact of the presence of a particular property effectively means that an item has this characteristic.

OAuth2 Client Credentials grant flow.description: Use this grant flow to access non-personalized TIDAL data.
